professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in Exadata, cloud services, and NoSQL databases. Proven track record in disaster recovery, high availability, and capacity planning across multiple organizations.

key_responsibilities: Configured and maintained Oracle 11g RAC two-node and four-node servers using SRVCTL
Implemented automated backup using Unix shell scripts and cron utilities.
Monitored and optimized database performance using Oracle Enterprise Manager
Configured and supported Oracle 11g RAC on AWS using RDS.
Implemented GoldenGate for transactional replication of DML operations and DDL changes.
Designed disaster recovery and high availability solutions for Oracle 11g standby databases.

technical_skills:
